core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Luxury Gold aesthetics with Cyber-Crypto tech.
Emotion First: Trust, Wealth, and Technological Security.
Content is King: The 'Gold Price' and 'PIO Value' must be the heroes.
Negative Space: Luxurious breathing room, do not clutter.
Contrast: Deep Obsidian backgrounds vs. Pierce Gold accents.
design_philosophy.vibe: Expensive, cinematic, moody, yet highly functional for trading.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Playfair Display' for H1-H3. Font weights: 700 (Bold) or 400 (Italic) for emphasis. Tracking: tight.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Manrope' for all UI text, labels, and inputs. Excellent readability for numbers.
usage_rules.numbers: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for wallet addresses, transaction hashes, and live tickers.

spacing.base: Relaxed. Use p-6, p-8, p-12 standard.
spacing.containers: Borders must have internal padding (p-6+) to prevent text collision.

grids.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B). Dense but aligned. Gap-4 or Gap-6.
grids.landing: Tetris Grid (Mode A). Asymmetrical. Hero col-span-full. Features alternating.

surfaces.cards: Glassmorphism or 'Tracing Beam' borders. bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10.
surfaces.headers: Sticky Glass. bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-lg border-b border-white/5.
surfaces.modals: Deep Obsidian. bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-[#D4AF37]/20 shadow-[0_0_40px_rgba(212,175,55,0.1)].

buttons.primary: Solid Gold Gradient (gold_rush). Text Black. Rounded-full or Sharp Rect (1px rounded). Hover: Scale 1.05.
buttons.secondary: Outline Gold. Border border-[#D4AF37]/50 text-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37]/10.

inputs.style: bg-zinc-900/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4AF37] rounded-md h-12.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add subtle 'noise' overlay to the background (opacity 0.03) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect on the Buy PIO card.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (Default). Use Gold color for active icons.

motion.rules: Stagger children for lists. Smooth fade-in for pages. Micro-scale on hover.

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay/gradient fade.

gold_coin.usage: Feature section or 'Gold Backed' value prop.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL MISSING DEPS: yarn add framer-motion @fontsource/playfair-display @fontsource/manrope @fontsource/jetbrains-mono
CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the Gold color palette provided in 'colors'.
GLOBAL CSS: Add the noise texture class to body.
COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'radius-0.5rem' look if it conflicts with the premium sharp aesthetic (try rounded-sm for a sharper finance look).
THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a toggle if the brand is strict Gold/Black.
NAVBAR: Create a glassmorphic sticky navbar. Logo on left (Gold), Connect Wallet on right (Gold Gradient Button).
BUY CARD: This is the most important component. Make it stand out with a glow or border beam.
REFERRAL TREE: Visualize the 3 levels clearly. Use a tree or step diagram.
ADMIN: Keep it functional but retain the Gold accents for active states.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling if possible.
Always set explicit hover text colors.
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
